shortDescription: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in debug.cgi in Linksys WAP54Gv3 firmware 3.05.03 and 3.04.03 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the data1 parameter.
vulnerabilityName: Cisco linksys_firmware Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
